# preferredContentMode

**Instance Property**

The content mode for the web view to use when it loads and renders a webpage.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var preferredContentMode: WKWebpagePreferences.ContentMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebpagePreferences/ContentMode/recommended]. The web view ignores this preference for subframe navigation.

## Setting the preferred content mode

- **WKWebpagePreferences.ContentMode**: Constants that indicate how to render web view content.
